unnormalised: Yeah, my uncle lost Rs. 50,000 to a phishing scam last month; some guy pretended to be from SBI and got his OTP. Now he's super paranoid about clicking any links, even from verified sources!
normalised: Yeah, my uncle lost rupee fifty thousand to a phishing scam last month; some guy pretended to be from S-B-I and got his O-T-P. Now he's super paranoid about clicking any links, even from verified sources!
